short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides subscriber number and button on YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With our innovative browser extension, experience a clutter-free and distraction-free viewing on YouTube. Our application seamlessly hides subscription numbers and buttons, allowing you to immerse yourself in content without the visual noise of subscriber metrics. Enjoy an enhanced viewing experience tailored to your preferences, emphasizing content over statistics for a more enjoyable and focused time on YouTube.
